query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `message_templates` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL,
  `category` enum('reminder','confirmation','recall','marketing','follow_up','emergency') NOT NULL,
  `language` varchar(10) DEFAULT 'es',
  `subject` varchar(300),
  `body_text` text NOT NULL,
  `variables` json,
  `is_active` tinyint DEFAULT 1,
  `usage_count` int DEFAULT 0,
  `last_used_at` timestamp NULL,
  `created_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  KEY `idx_category` (`category`),
  KEY `idx_active` (`is_active`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`created_by`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

INSERT INTO message_templates (name, category, language, body_text, variables, is_active) VALUES
('Recordatorio 2 días antes', 'reminder', 'es', 'Hola {{patientName}}, le recordamos su cita con {{doctorName}} el {{appointmentDate}} a las {{appointmentTime}}. Clínica Odonto Chin.', '["patientName","doctorName","appointmentDate","appointmentTime"]', 1),
('Recordatorio 1 día antes', 'reminder', 'es', 'Estimado/a {{patientName}}, su cita es mañana {{appointmentDate}} a las {{appointmentTime}} con {{doctorName}}. Nos vemos pronto!', '["patientName","doctorName","appointmentDate","appointmentTime"]', 1),
('Confirmación de cita', 'confirmation', 'es', 'Gracias por confirmar su cita, {{patientName}}. Lo esperamos el {{appointmentDate}} a las {{appointmentTime}}.', '["patientName","appointmentDate","appointmentTime"]', 1)
